modName: Thalmor clothes color retexture pack HD
summary: Thalmor clothes color retexture pack 2048x2048. Red,Darker red, Green, Yellow, Purple, Blue, Golden, Normal upscaled.
descriptionHtml:
Thalmor clothes color retexture pack 2048x2048. Male and female versions. My characters male imperial so if any you want to upload any pic\'s of female or other races thank you.

All versions are 2048x2048.

Red
Darker red (I think the best of them, But that\'s my opinion).
Yellow
Golden
Blue
Purple
Green
Normal upscaled (more golden brown)

Thalmor retextured color pack.

Install:

1.Unzip
2.pick a folder color
3.rename folder to data
4.copy folder that you renamed to skyrim folder (where you tesv.exe is)

Nexus manager won\'t work due the way this is packed.

Hope you all enjoy.

Author
Draco1122

Keep in mind pictures are in good lighting will be darker in game in most areas.


[color=yellow][u][b]My other mods[/b][/u][/color]
[color=yellow][u][b]Draco1122[/b][/u][/color]
